title: Calories in 1 Mango Without Skin
meta_description: Discover calories in 1 mango without skin, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per serving.
assumptions: Medium mango (≈165g edible flesh), peeled, pit removed, fresh, ripe but not overripe.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, size, and growing conditions. Check labels when available for packaged fruit.

quick_answer.text: One medium mango without skin provides ~99 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 mango without skin?
faqs.a: About 99 kcal for one medium mango without skin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a peeled mango?
faqs.a: ≈25 g carbs, including 2.6 g fiber and 22.7 g natural sugars.

faqs.q: Is mango low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: Very low fat (0.6 g) and protein (1.4 g); it's mostly carbs from fruit sugars.

faqs.q: Does skin removal affect calories much?
faqs.a: Minimal impact; skin is thin and low-cal, but edible portion is the focus here.

faqs.q: How does mango size change calorie count?
faqs.a: Smaller mangos ≈60 kcal, larger ≈120 kcal; weigh edible flesh for accuracy.
